attributes.action: Stop the Proposed Scheme to Make Compulsory to Have a Motor Car have insurance even whilst is not being Driven
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The new law proposes to make it an offence to leave a car on the road whilst it is not insured.Many people do not have an of road parking facility and may wish to leave the vehical out of use for financial reasons.Big brother
wishes to dictate again.!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
